programme.title: An Endless Summer
programme.desc: Through the testimonies of six characters and with the help of amateur footage drawn from three decades of rider archives, this exclusive documentary showcases the birth of urban skateboarding in Marseille.

programme.title: Kald Sòl
programme.desc: The film sheds light on the surprising resources of cold countries, and on the search for waves guided by climatic uncertainties. Samuel Redon, a young professional surfer accustomed to warm-water surfing, is about to discover a whole new world of surfing.

programme.title: Chasing Dreams
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Chasing Dreams -Episode 1
programme.desc: A thrilling journey through Chasing Dreams, where every trail becomes a battleground for victory. From the peaks of the Basque Country to the routes of Chamonix, witness the determination of trail runners as they chase their dreams on the Golden Trail World Series.

programme.title: Chasing Dreams
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Chasing Dreams -Episode 2
programme.desc: A thrilling journey through Chasing Dreams, where every trail becomes a battleground for victory. From the peaks of the Basque Country to the routes of Chamonix, witness the determination of trail runners as they chase their dreams on the Golden Trail World Series.

programme.title: Open Faces 2025 - YETI Freeride Junior World Championships Kappl/Paznaun - LIVE Part 1
programme.desc: Open Faces 2025 - YETI Freeride Junior World Championships Kappl/Paznaun - LIVE Part 1

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2023
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 WOF 2023 #11: Digital & Virtual Sport Special Gaming Docu
programme.desc: Restart the Game 2023 & ICF Open Virtual World Cup & World Rowing Indoor Championship

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2023
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 WOF 2023 #12: King of the Court 2022 Finals – Doha (QAT)
programme.desc: King of the Court 2022 Finals - January 11th-14th, Doha (QAT. )Das zweite Jahr in Folge ist die Aspire Zone Gastgeber für die King of the Court Crown Series.

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2023
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 WOF 2023 #13: Freeride World Tour 2023 - Stop #4 - Fieberbrunn (AUT)
programme.desc: Die Freeride World Tour 2023 hat ihren vierten Stopp in Fieberbrunn, Österreich - wie immer mit den besten Freeridern aus aller Welt! Der erste Teil des FWT-Finales findet in Fieberbrunn statt, wo die Athleten den imposanten Wildseeloder bezwingen müssen. Dieser Berg ist selbst für die erfahrensten Profis ein echter Härtetest und die Athleten werden sicherlich alles geben müssen.

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2023
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 WOF 2023 #14: Golden Fly Series 2023 - Bangkok (THA)
programme.desc: Das etablierte innerstädtische Leichtathletikspektakel, die Golden Fly Series 2023, kehrte nach seinem ersten Auftritt in Phuket im Jahr 2021 nach Thailand zurück und fand in der Hauptstadt des Landes, Bangkok, statt.

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 WOF 2024 #12: Gorges de l’Ardèche Kayaking Marathon & Sainté Lyon
programme.desc: Join us in France for the 39th Gorges de l’Ardèche International Marathon in the stunning Ardèche gorge, followed by the legendary SaintéLyon night run in Lyon and Saint-Étienne, now in its 69th edition and attracting up to 20,000 participants annually!

programme.title: THE RIO CAQUETA
programme.desc: Jules Domine and Tyler Bradt, obsessed and addicted to whitewater adventure, make a plan to journey the long way, from the source of Rio Caqueta 1,000 Kilometers downstream to an unreal big water canyon deep in the Colombian Amazon.

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 WOF 2024 #13: GKA & GWA - Best Of World Cup Cape Verde
programme.desc: Cape Verde is blessed with a moderate climate, north-easterly trade winds and warm ocean swells that break on the islands' reefs, making it a paradise for Kite-Surfing and wingfoiling. Sal island in particular boasts one of the world's greatest right-hand point-breaks.

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2017
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Dare To Live Your Dream - Athlete Profil Fabian Buhl - Alpinist
programme.desc: Buhl knew he was ready to take on a new challenge - solo-redpointing. He chose to tackle the Wetterbockwand in winter via the long approach across "Wilder Freithof", a steep couloir which is extremely exposed with a high danger of avalanches.

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 WOF 2025 #09: Asics Saintélyon
programme.desc: The Asics SaintéLyon is a legendary nocturnal ultramarathon in France that takes place on the route from Saint-Étienne to Lyon. The 2025 edition is scheduled for November 29 and 30 and promises to be an unforgettable experience for everyone involved.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024 - Jericoacoara (BRA)
programme.desc: Jericoacoara/Brazil welcomes the Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024, where the world's best kiteboarders test the limits of big air. This hotspot provides a stage for breathtaking jumps, technical tricks and intense competitions.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Ibiraquera (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the world's best wingfoilers will meet. With its constant winds and breathtaking coastline, this Brazilian hotspot provides the perfect backdrop for exciting races.

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 WOF 2025 #10: World Rookie Tour - 20 Years Anniversary Documentary
programme.desc: Launched in 2005, the World Rookie Tour (WRT) is the largest international youth action sports series dedicated to developing the next generation of professional athletes in the sports of snowboarding, freeskiing, skateboarding and surfing.

programme.title: An Endless Summer
programme.desc: Through the testimonies of six characters and with the help of amateur footage drawn from three decades of rider archives, this exclusive documentary showcases the birth of urban skateboarding in Marseille.

programme.title: WOF Evergreens
programme.sub-title: S01 : E55 adidas Sickline - Extreme Kayak World Championship - The Documentary
programme.desc: This is the documentary about the history of the famous "Wellerbrücke" rapids, a famous section of the glacier-fed Ötztaler Ache river in Tyrol, and the adidas Sickline Extreme Kayak World Championship.

programme.title: WOF Evergreens
programme.sub-title: S01 : E56 Outdoorsports Team - The Fascination of ski Mountaineering
programme.desc: The film “Fascination of Ski Mountaineering” shows four top Austrian athletes doing high-alpine ski mountaineering from the Mittelbergjoch over the Taschach Glacier to the Wildspitze.

programme.title: WOF Evergreens
programme.sub-title: S01 : E57 Canyoning 2008
programme.desc: Canyoning is one of the most exciting outdoor sports and for many it is a true decathlon of extreme activities. Physical fitness, team spirit and trust are of the utmost importance.

programme.title: WOF Evergreens
programme.sub-title: S01 : E58 adidas Outdoorsports Team 2012: Canyoning - Unicycling - Slacklining
programme.desc: Modern outdoor sport has many facets. Today we follow the Outdoor Sports Team for venturesome jumps, fast downhills and balancing acts in dizzy heights. We start in Ticino.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 7, Portugal
programme.desc: The competition continues in Portugal with 6 events and thousands of spectators

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 8, Croatia
programme.desc: Episode 8 takes place in 36 degree heat in Croatia and sees the return of Krzysztof Radzikowski after a 2 month absence due to injury

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 9, Poland
programme.desc: SCL returns to Poland with 12 athletes all battling for the number one title

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 10, Hungary
programme.desc: The 10th stage takes place in Hungary and features new super talent!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 11, Zambia
programme.desc: The first ever SCL in Zambia! The athletes get to take in some of the stunning sights and go on to do events such as Tyre Flip and Log Lift

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 12, Romania
programme.desc: The competition moves to Romania and for the first time this season the athletes compete in rainy conditions which make the events even tougher

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 13, Lithunia
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition takes place in Lithunia and world records are once again broken!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 14, Estonia
programme.desc: Episode 14 takes place in Estonia where drama and world records will be seen again

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 15, Malaysia (World Finals Part 1)
programme.desc: Taking place over 2 days in Malaysia, this is part 1 of the world finals of Strongman Champions League!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 16, Malaysia (World Finals Part 2)
programme.desc: Who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League - we find out who is crowned as world champion today in the second part of the final epsiode

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: Across seven rivers, through mountains and forests, 12 strongmen go to toughest places to find out who is strongest Viking in the World and open a new season of Strongman champions league for 2015. Events like the Hercules Hold, Yoke Race and pulling a real Viking ship are some of the ingredients of this fantastic show.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of Strongman champions league will be hosted in Germany, by FIBO - the leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health worldwide with 300,000 visitors in four days. Special implements like the biggest log in the world or the special Bavarian stone lift are not only a challenge, but also an opportunity for new personal, national and world records.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 3, Holland
programme.desc: Holland is hosting 12 different countries with 14 of the strongest men in the world for the third stage of the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 4, Finland
programme.desc: Zydrunas Savickas, one of strongest people on earth is in this competition which has attracted the attention of the audience in the battle for the title of strongest man in Finland. The next round of SCL is in Bulgaria.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 5, Bulgaria
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition is in Bulgaria where Ervin Katona (SCL World Champion 2012) will compete for the last time.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 6, Latvia
programme.desc: Krzysztof Radzikowski, the leader in the league will fight hard to keep Dainis Zageris off from the title and to gather another 25 ranking points in this next stage in Latvia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 7, Croatia
programme.desc: The competition sees a close battle with a new world record in overhead dumbbell and close finishes throughout the day. This stage is in Croatia, in a city over 1700 years old, steeped in Roman tradition and history, the athletes arrive for the truck pull after a picturesque boat ride on the Adriatic Sea.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 8, Poland
programme.desc: We are now half way through the SCL 2015 and getting closer to the grand world finals in Turkey. The eighth stage is in Poland, the home country of the current leader Krzysztof Radzikowski.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 9, Austria
programme.desc: In this stage we go into the mountains of Austria to find out through six grueling events who is the strongest in the land of Alps. Martin Wildauer, current World Champion 2014 and Austrian local is competing alongside Zageris, Radzikowski, Belsak and many others.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 10, Romania
programme.desc: The 10th stage of this year's competition in Strongman Champions League is held in the Romanian city of Sibiu where the 12 strongmen continue to compete for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 11, World Log Lift Championship
programme.desc: The 11th stage is the SCL Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. In this championship, each competitor must lift three different weights overhead. Zydrunas Savickas is the current world record holder in the Log Lift.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 12, Lithuania
programme.desc: This next episode of the Strongman Champions League is hosted in Lithuania and sees us getting one step closer to the final.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 13, Portugal
programme.desc: The 13th stage of Strongman Champions League is in Maia, Portugal. The competition is at the “Powerexpo” – one of the best sport and fitness events in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 14, Martinique
programme.desc: This stage is in Martinique and eight strongmen from all over the world will compete for the last chance to gather points before the world grand finals in December.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 15, Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: A special World championship under the newcomers and lightweights in the Strongman world. Some of them will step from this to the heavyweights divisions.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 16, World Finals Turkey
programme.desc: After 15 outstanding competitions all over the world, finally we are here at the final competition of this year’s Strongman Champions League hosted in Turkey.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 1, Norway - World strongest Viking
programme.desc: Welcome to the land of Vikings - Norway - to the first stage of the SCL World Series 2016

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of the SCL heads to the FIBO convention, Cologne. The leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health hosts.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 3, Lithuania - Log lift World championship
programme.desc: For the third stage of SCL world series 2016, the athletes compete in Kaunas for the SCL Log Lift World Championships.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: Stage four is an epic competition and a few surprises. With 14 strongmen from all over the world, one newcomer left quite an impression.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 5, Latvia
programme.desc: This year Lauri Nami joins the starting list, back after last year's injury in Romania

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 6, Serbia
programme.desc: The SCL train stopped in Zlatibor for the stage 6 of the MLO SCL. 11 compete for the title in the home country of legendary Ervin Katona.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 7, Bulgaria
programme.desc: Bulgaria hosts the next stage of the SCL. Current leader in the World Series is Matjaz Belsak, youngest competitor and strongest man of Slovenia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 8, England
programme.desc: The competitors battle it out in the special event, the Atlas Steel Stone. This stone is made completely from iron and cannot be touched with any support.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 9, Finland
programme.desc: This stage sees the strongmen visit Vaasa, Finland. Residents here are familiar with the competition because some of the SCL icons are from their country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 10, Finland - World championship under 105 kilograms
programme.desc: 38 athletes compete in the under 90kg and under 105kg SCL World Championships. From each weight class, the top 12 qualify for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 11, Romania Part 1
programme.desc: A two day, seven event battle with lots of spectators.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 12, Romania Part 2
programme.desc: Alex Moonen is leading. Part two of the competition in Romania showcases a new challenge - Hercules Hold.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 13, Curacao
programme.desc: In this stage in Curacao no one wants to lose the chance to fight for one kilo gold in World grand finals in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 14, Portugal
programme.desc: The last chance to qualify for the World Grand Finale. Zageris and Belsak fight for the better position for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 15, Dubai World grand finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We reach Dubai where we will crown the new champion for SCL 2016. This is part one of the world finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 16, Dubai World grand finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this last episode, the best athletes compete in Pole Push, Deadlift, Forward Hold and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: We are in beautiful Norway for the kick off of the 2017 MLO Strongman Champions League season. With partly cloudy weather and lots of snow, we have the perfect scenery for the athletes, who prepare for the first contest of the year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 3, Lithuania
programme.desc: This weekend sees the Strongman Champions League Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. Big lifting names such as Graham Hicks , Vidas Blekaitis and Vytatus Lalas are in the startlist to push some big numbers.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: A definite highlight in this FIBO edition in Germany, Strongman Champions League introduced its new rules for a special team item. Graham Hicks tries here to set a New World Record on the biggest log in the world, currently held by Krzysztof Radzikowski. Boosted also by the presence of the acclaimed in the strongman circles names of Mark Felix and Danis Zageris.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: The battle of the Dutch will take place this edition in Lichtenvoorde, a place very well known in Holland because of the famous “Black Cross”. The athletes will compete over six heavy events and the winner gets 25 Strongman Champions League ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 5, Serbia
programme.desc: Set in the beautiful mountain resort Zlatibor, the fifth stage of the Strongman Champions League 2017 sees 14 athletes from across the world competing for the gold medal of SCL Serbia 2017. The event welcomes top-athlete - and odds-on favourite - Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia), who has presented himself in an impressive shape so far. Can his opponents defeat him?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 6, Canada (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next two stages take place in Quebec. With eight events over two days, SCL Canada is a true ‘heavyweight’. The athletes compete in: Truck Pull, Deadlift with cars, Log Lift, and the Atlas Stones. The World’s Strongest Viking Jean-Francois Caron from Canada is a favourite, as well as current SCL leader Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and promising underdog Jimmy Paquet (Canada).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 7, Canada (Part 2)
programme.desc: Welcome to the second day in Quebec. The athletes are fighting hard to win this two-day event. The last points of this SCL stage can be won over four outstanding disciplines: Power Stairs, Dumbbell Press, Keg Toss, and finally, the legendary Farmer’s Walk. Who will leave Canada with the yellow ‘Leader Shirt’?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: The fight for the Finnish trophy continues. In this unmissable SCL event, the strongmen battle for the win in the Carry and Drag, the Forward Hold, Deadlifting with Cars and the Loading Race. Belsak, Radzikowski and Zageris look good after the first day, but the others haven’t given up yet.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stages 8 and 9 of the SCL are hosted in Vaasa, Finland, taking place over a spectacular two-day event. After 3 wins so far, Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia plans to extend his lead at the top of the table. Among the other 13 highly motivated strongmen, two SCL legends will make their comeback to the competition: Former World Champion of 2015, Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland) and Dainis Zageris (Latvia).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 10, Finland Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: This under 105kg category event is the ultimate preparation for up-and-coming strongman athletes before entering the heavy class. The Lightweight World Championship is a special every year in the SCL calendar as it sees new talents rise and many promising athletes who are gearing up for future tournaments. A total of 25 athletes from 16 different countries make their way to Kokkola, Finland

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E11 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 11, Romania
programme.desc: Situated in the very heart of the Carpathian Mountains, Sibiu is a Romanian town where the climate is pleasantly mild, offering some of the best weather conditions for a strongman event around Europe. All this, without doubt, set the mood for the high results and showtime vibes in Stage 11 of Strongman Champions League. The competition in Sibiu was organized in six different disciplines

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E12 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 12, Curacao
programme.desc: From now on every stage of these series will be more than crucial. Curacao is a beautiful Dutch island in the Caribbean, with a great atmosphere to hold another stage of the MLO Strongman Champions League. Let’s see who takes the title here and who will secure a place in the next stage.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E13 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 13, Jordan
programme.desc: Ten of the world’s strongest men gathered in Amman to compete in Jordan’s first-ever Truck-Pull Championship. The contestants race against the clock while pulling a 21-ton truck across the track. One of the most fierce competitors to take part in the event was four-time winner of the World’s Strongest Man competition, Brian Shaw.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 14, Greece
programme.desc: Taking place in Corinth, Greece, considered by many the cradle of the sports competition games, an epic strongman battle will mark the last stage before the upcoming big two-day season’s finale in Chetumal, Mexico. In front of more than 5000 spectators, the twelve athletes compete in Log Lifts, Card Deadlift, Conan’s Wheel and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E15 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 15, Mexico World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first day of the two-part finale sees the strongest men competing in Carry and Drag, Dumbbell Lift and the Truck Pull. Everything is possible in this heated fight for the crown against the backdrop of stunning Chetumal, Mexico.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E16 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 16, Mexico World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: On the second day of the grand finale of the 2017 Strongman Champions League, the athletes have a last chance to secure the medals in the spectacular four events Weight for Height, Deadlift Cars, Forward Hold and The Loading Medley. Be prepared for stunning performances – and even world records!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 1, Norway - World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: Season 2018 begins with 14 strongest men in the world, all competing for the title. The competition kicks off in Norway. We’ll see typical Viking disciplines, team events and world records in heavy conditions in the land of snow and ice. They will suffer, they will freeze and fight in this first competition of the year for the title that they will carry on their shoulders throughout whole year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 2, Germany - FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capichampions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2018 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 3, Abu Dhabi
programme.desc: For the first time in history, Strongman Champions League will set up competition in Abu Dhabi. The line-up of super athletes, who are part of the SCL, includes former world champions Dainis Zageris (Latvia) & Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland), current world champion Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and biggest strongman in the World Sean O’Hagan (Ireland).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Strongman classic in land where there is no place for anything else excepts strength, fight and endurance. Here are fourteen of the strongest men, fighting for the title of strongest in Holland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 5, Holland (Part 2)
programme.desc: We go back to Holland, where former champion Dainis Zageris is in leading position after the first three events. Alongside Radzikowski, he is in this moment favorite for world title, and also leader shirt holder.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 6, Finland
programme.desc: Stage six of Strongman champions league, 2018 is set back on north, in Finland. Here we have Matjaz Belsak, wearing SCL leader shirt, one of the biggest strongman in the World Mika Torro, fan favorite strongman in all over the World – Will Baggott, and also big name from Baltic – Aivars Smaukstelis

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 7, Serbia
programme.desc: Twelve strongman, including defending Worldchampion Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia , will compete on “Air spa” for the title of best in homeland country of Tesla, Pupin, Novak Djokovic. Matjaz Belsak is the SCL leader in this competition, chasing his third victory this season.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E08 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 8, Finland - U105 (Part 1)
programme.desc: The World championship in lightweights of the Strongman Champions League bring to us 50 strongmen from all over the world. All athletes are under 105 kilograms and for them this is the step up to the ultimate heavyweights.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E09 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 9, Finland - U105 (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this second stage of the World championship of lightweights we will find out who out of the 12 athletes will win the title in the under 105 kilogram category.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 GLORY 1 Stockholm
programme.desc: GLORY 01: Stockholm from the Ericsson Globe in Stockholm, Sweden on May 26, 2012. This event featured the world title fight for the inaugural Glory Heavyweight championship between Semmy Schilt and Errol Zimmerman as headliner. The event also featured qualification bouts for the Glory 70kg Slam Tournament.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S10 : E03 GLORY 79 Arnhem 2
programme.desc: Serkan Ozcaglayan makes his GLORY premiere, a battle of the best Featherweights in the division and Nabiev takes on Troy Jones in the Welterweight division.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S10 : E03 GLORY COLLISION 3
programme.desc: Rico Verhoeven defends his title against Jamal Ben Saddik, Gokhan Saki Returns, Maslobojev, Plazibat, Duut and more.

programme.title: K1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E46 K1 World Grand Prix: Final 14, Osaka, 2003
programme.desc: K-1 World Grand Prix 2003 Final Elimination was a kickboxing event promoted by the K-1 organization. The event was held at the Osaka Dome in Osaka, Japan on Saturday, October 11, 2003 in front of 31,700 spectators. It was the final elimination competition for the K-1 World Grand Prix 2003, involving fourteen fighters from across the world, with all bouts being fought under K-1 Rules (100 kg/156-220 lbs). The fourteen fighters were a mixture of invitees or had qualified via previous events.

programme.desc: Headlined by the exciting and long-awaited rematch between GLORY heavyweights Jamal Ben Saddik and Benjamin Adegbuyi. Also featuring the first title defence for GLORY middleweight champion Donovan Wisse against up and comer Juri de Sousa.

programme.title: K1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E47 K1 World Grand Prix: Finals, Tokyo, 2003
programme.desc: K-1 World Grand Prix 2003 Final was a kickboxing event promoted by the K-1 organization. The event was held at the Tokyo Dome in Tokyo, Japan on Saturday, December 6, 2003 in front of 67,320 spectators. It was the eleventh K-1 World Grand Prix final involving ten of the world's best fighters (two being reservists). The eight finalists had almost all qualified via preliminary events, while two additional fighters were invited as reserve fighters (for more detail on this see bulleted list below), with all bouts being fought under K-1 Rules (100 kg/156-220 lbs).

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 GLORY 2 Brussels

programme.desc: Get ready for HK51 by watching Mississippi native Adrian Miles' last HK fight, an epic battle with UFC alum Rodney Wallace. He's getting ready to face Miles Anstead on October 14!

programme.title: Fight Vault - HK30 - Episode 2
programme.desc: The School of Hard Knocks 30 filmed at the Century Casino in Calgary. Professional and Amateur fighters from across North America battle it out in the cage. Louie Grover vs. Blake Sigvaldason; Dale Tallman vs. Des Ryland; Zach Snider vs. Randy Chung [title fight].

programme.title: OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.desc: Coming from a history of drinking heavily and drug abuse, Nick Burnham was able to turn his life around completely by prioritizing his MMA training. Now, at HK38, Nick is looking to take the Lightweight title away from Dauda Keita in a fight that goes the distance!

programme.title: OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.desc: Ukraine born Anton Tokarchuck is known for his massive knock outs. At HK35, he takes on Jesse Day Rider - a fighter who has never been knocked out. Anton has worked incredibly hard at the gym for this and is looking to continue his knock out winning streak.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Ultimate Warrior Challenge is one of Europe's leading MMA shows, since it's inception in 2006 it's has grown steadily and delivered some of the most exciting MMA fights Europe has seen, with a truly Internationalfight roster, UWC has built a solid reputation for bringing some of the Worlds toughest fighters to square off in the UWC octagon, fighters from the UK, USA, Brazil, Sweden, Italy, Africa, Poland, France, Cyprus, Greece have all fought in the UWC cage.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: This is heavyweight fighting at its best and bloodiest. Finnish muay thai champion Jarno Nurminen makes his mised martial art debut against Korean judo expert Sag Su Lee. And in one of the sport's best brawls, Roy Nelson goes toe-to-toe with Josh Curran.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: World renowned jiu-jitsu expert Rodrigo Damm takes on the hard hitting 'Black Mamba'. And wrestler Mike Brown takes on Yves Edwards, a veteran of the UFC and Pride.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Coach Dan Miller puts his wealth of experience and knowledge into helping fighters train properly and get ready to step into the cage the right way. He considers it a gift to be able to help Jess Elverum's MMA career.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Mike Short comes from a history of street fighting and recognizes the importance of training and discipline. He has been coaching Boxing for many years and relishes the fact that his entire family comes together at his events, run out of Dekada Gym.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Jesse Arnett attributes most of his success to his coaches, in particular Jake Peacock. Jake was born with only a partial arm. This coach and fighter doesn't let that stop him from training some of the best athletes in the world.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Coaches in fight sport are at times an underrated but yet intergral part of an athlete's success. What makes them give up their day, weeks and years to help their fighters be the best in the world? This episode features Craig Wilson as we delve into the life of a coach.

programme.title: OUT OF THE CAGE

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Chael Sonnen has trained with Team Quest, alongside fighters like Matt Lindland and Randy Couture. Tim Credeur has kept busy fighting on the US navy jiu-jitsu and judo teams, and making some cash in bullpen fights in Tijuana.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: MMA Veteran Nick Thompson goes up against the brute force of wrestling star Davion Peterson. Thompson has more pro fight experience than anyone on the first series, and will need all of it to hold his own against the relentless Peterson.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Spartan Events is into its third year of running its hugely successful promotion, Shock N Awe. With top match making throughout the fight cards, they have been touted as some of the biggest and toughest fights in the UK. Shock N Awe consistently delivers hard hitting action, also going one step further by adding in the personalities from MC Ricky Wright, Ring Girls Poppy and Alex and as well as the huge UK fight teams!

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Bill Mahood has studied every martial art imaginable, and he'll need all that experience when he takes on Kalil Ibrahim, a karate ans kickboxing expert. Steve Steinbeiss fights Jeff Ford, an MMA champion and a personal trainer on VH1's Celebrity Fight Club.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Ron Bushfield takes us through his wrestling and coaching career, and gives us some insight into what his days look like. He loves to coach and always finds time to speak to his students individually. He's worked extensively with Hard Knocks fighter Noah Ali and today we'll follow him as he transfers his knowledge to the students on the mat.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S04 : E65 Jodha Akbar S4 E65
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 This is Fate S2 E25
programme.desc: The story revolves around the two sisters of Pragya, from Kumkum Bhagya. Her sisters are Preeta and Shristhi who discover the existence of their mother Sarla and sister Pragya, after their father’s death. The sisters try to unite with their mother and sister.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.sub-title: S01 : E373 Trinayani S1 E373
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Guddan
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Guddan S2 E15
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E372 Undercover Love S1 E372
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.sub-title: S01 : E35 Gangaa S2 E35
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.sub-title: S03 : E112 Mehek S3 E112
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Maitree
programme.sub-title: S01 : E127 Maitree: The Rules of Love S1 E127
programme.desc: The lives of three friends, Nandini, Maitree and Ashish get inexplicably intertwined when an accident brings unexpected changes in their lives.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E373 King of Hearts S1 E373
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E373 Second Chances S1 E373
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 This is Fate S2 E25
programme.desc: The story revolves around the two sisters of Pragya, from Kumkum Bhagya. Her sisters are Preeta and Shristhi who discover the existence of their mother Sarla and sister Pragya, after their father’s death. The sisters try to unite with their mother and sister.

programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Guddan S2 E17

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Episode 12
programme.desc: Once again it was time for the VLN Endurance Racing Championship. While the drivers were doing their test laps, we had a look behind the scenes and explored what went on in the pit lanes.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 Episode 21
programme.desc: In this episode, we focused on Phoenix Racing, the successful team from the Eifel Region that rocked the DTM.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S01 : E73 McLaren MP4 12C GT3
programme.desc: McLaren's MP4 12C GT3 is as fast as a Formula One car. We explored how this super sports car came to be. Also: the German company Mechatronik specializes in restoring rare and classic cars like the Mercedes W111.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S01 : E74 Supercars of the Frankfurt Motor Show
programme.desc: We took a look at the IAA Frankfurt 2011 highlights, like the new Porsche 911, Mercedes' SLS AMG Roadster, the Bentley Continental Convertible, a 1,100 hp monster from Croatia and others.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 All-Wheel Vehicles for the Streets
programme.desc: The Audi Q2 is a sportback coupe is the entry-level model for the German brand’s SUV range. Also: test-driving the SsangYong XLV lifestyle SUV. And: Mercedes present their "sportscar among SUVs", the GLC Coupe.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 Fascination offroad
programme.desc: We test drove the Rallye Defender and examined how a Jeep Wrangler with only few modifications can double in price. Also: how does the Fiat Panda 4x4 fare in Iceland? Also: Land Rover's Bowler Defender and Volvo's 6-wheeler, the Laplander.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.sub-title: S01 : E47 All-Wheel cars with a lot of space
programme.desc: The Cadillac Escalade is the brand's flagship SUV and the epitome of American luxury SUVs. We also test drove the sixth generation of the popular Volkswagen Multivan in Stockholm.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E54 Sporty Fords
programme.desc: The 1955 Ford Thunderbird is part of Henry Ford's motorsports legacy. In addition: the Ford Capri from the May car tuning company is as fast as a 1970s Porsche. And: the Ford Mustang, the progenitor of the so-called pony car.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E35 Goodwood Revival, Part 2
programme.desc: Famous actors in a classic car craze, diving Spitfire airplanes and ridiculously expensive vintage cars. You can see all this at a very special event, the Goodwood Revival.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E47 Close to the ground
programme.desc: In their 4 series BMW took into account that sporty vehicles need a low center of gravity. In the manufacturer's range of vehicles this model is closest to the asphalt. We compared the BMW 435i and Porsche's Cayman S and took a look at the Alfa Romeo 4C.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S03 : E56 Turbo Diesel Power
programme.desc: We took a look at Audi's latest generation of TDI engines and their RS5 TDI Concept. In addition we compared the advantages and disadvantages of the two main fossil fuels for cars, gasoline and diesel. And: the 2014 Porsche Cayenne Diesel.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Outback Off-Road Adventure
programme.desc: Australia's North-East is famous for its nature and wildlife. We accompanied the Germans Katrin and Uli on their 4x4 tour on the Great Tropical Drive in Queensland. Also: Clash of the Titans. We compared the Toyota Landcruiser and Mitsubishi Pajero.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Ready to Race with Ken Block
programme.desc: Whenever Ken Block is involved in the World Rallycross Championship, the audience goes crazy. Thanks to his spectacular “Gymkhana” drifting videos he became a superstar in the motorsports scene. Wherever he shows up, tires are smoking.

programme.title: Motorcycles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E35 Custombike
programme.desc: The Custombike show in Bad Salzuflen, Germany, is one of the leading fairs for exclusive motorcycles in Europe and a hub for news and trends in the motorbike scene. From choppers, to cruisers, street fighters to classic bikes, Harleys to Japanese motorcycles, this show always offers something exciting for every taste and age.

programme.title: Motorcycles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E38 Trikes
programme.desc: Whether taking it easy and cruising, or firing it up and drifting - trikes, scooters and three-wheeled bike conversions all have their own charm and driving dynamics, especially the trikes. We take a closer look at four rather exotic motorcycles: the Rewaco RF1 Turbo, Piaggio's MP3 and bike conversions for the Suzuki 800 Intruder and the Triumph Rocket III Touring.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E105 Best of 2012
programme.desc: Racing driver Patrick Simon presents a few of his personal highlights, like the Ferrari FF, McLaren's British super car MP4 12C, the Lamborghinis Gallardo Performante and Superleggera and the versatile Lexus IS-F.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E108 The Pagani Story
programme.desc: To sports car fans the name Pagani is connected with the manufacturer's thunderous 12-cylinder high-performance engine. Their Huayra model isn't comparable to any other sports car, it’s one of the most exclusive cars available.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Episode 10
programme.desc: Christian Menzel asked our presenter Miriam to participate in a driver safety training where he showed tips and tricks on what to do in emergency situations.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Episode 12
programme.desc: Once again it was time for the VLN Endurance Racing Championship. While the drivers were doing their test laps, we had a look behind the scenes and explored what went on in the pit lanes.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 Episode 21
programme.desc: In this episode, we focused on Phoenix Racing, the successful team from the Eifel Region that rocked the DTM.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S01 : E73 McLaren MP4 12C GT3
programme.desc: McLaren's MP4 12C GT3 is as fast as a Formula One car. We explored how this super sports car came to be. Also: the German company Mechatronik specializes in restoring rare and classic cars like the Mercedes W111.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S01 : E74 Supercars of the Frankfurt Motor Show
programme.desc: We took a look at the IAA Frankfurt 2011 highlights, like the new Porsche 911, Mercedes' SLS AMG Roadster, the Bentley Continental Convertible, a 1,100 hp monster from Croatia and others.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 All-Wheel Vehicles for the Streets
programme.desc: The Audi Q2 is a sportback coupe is the entry-level model for the German brand’s SUV range. Also: test-driving the SsangYong XLV lifestyle SUV. And: Mercedes present their "sportscar among SUVs", the GLC Coupe.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 Fascination offroad
programme.desc: We test drove the Rallye Defender and examined how a Jeep Wrangler with only few modifications can double in price. Also: how does the Fiat Panda 4x4 fare in Iceland? Also: Land Rover's Bowler Defender and Volvo's 6-wheeler, the Laplander.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.sub-title: S01 : E47 All-Wheel cars with a lot of space
programme.desc: The Cadillac Escalade is the brand's flagship SUV and the epitome of American luxury SUVs. We also test drove the sixth generation of the popular Volkswagen Multivan in Stockholm.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S03 : E62 Auction Classics
programme.desc: Nowadays the gull-winged classic DeLorean is an automotive investment. Also: 100 dream cars under the hammer at a classic car auction in Switzerland. And: modern classics with investment potential like the Mercedes 190E 2.3 16V.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E41 Vintage Cars Worldwide
programme.desc: In Thailand a Mercedes 190 SL and other souped-up classics take part in the Bangkok Classic Car Ride. Plus: an Oldsmobile convertible on Venezuela's most beautiful island. And: classic cars from the US as a tourist attraction in Cuba.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Animal-like Cars
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, Dean Malay put the Hollywood appeal of the Volkswagen Beetle Convertible to the test. Also: at the BMW Design Night the Bavarian manufacturer showcased its newest creations. And: the Stuck brothers with the Lexus IS-F at the test track.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 To the Top!
programme.desc: The Audi Sport Quattro S1 was a rally legend. We checked how the company's series vehicle A1 Quattro fares in comparison. Also: the Stuck brothers take the Ford Focus ST to the test track. And: the spacey, but cute electric microcar Renault Twizy.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.sub-title: S01 : E33 Pickups
programme.desc: In Europe pickups are mainly used commercially. In the US these trucks are as common as SUVs. We compared the Volkswagen Amarok to the Toyota Hilux. Also: current US pickups, the Chevrolet Colorado and GMC's Sierra and Canyon.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 Tuned SUVs
programme.desc: SUVs usually are rather impressive right out of the factory, but there are many tuning and customizing options. In this episode we present Kelleners BMW X5, the Mercedes Brabus B63 and the Porsche Cayenne tuned by Techart.

programme.title: Made in ...
programme.sub-title: S01 : E33 Eurocopter
programme.desc: The Eurocopter EC 135 is the most successful and best-selling helicopter in the world and a multi-talent. Whether as a VIP shuttle, in air rescue or for the police. This all-rounder is even used for military tasks.

programme.title: Made in ...
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 Unimog
programme.desc: It is a synonym and a touchstone for four-wheel drive movement. It is the symbol for quality of commercial vehicle constructions worldwide. Mercedes-Benz manufactured for the 60th birthday a new Unimog.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Ferruccio Lamborghini
programme.desc: In 1964, Ferruccio Lamborghini set himself the goal to build the best sports cars in the world, a bold move, being located only a few kilometers from Ferrari.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Alois Ruf
programme.desc: Alois Ruf is the founder of a small, but well-known car manufacturing company in Bavaria that specialises in building their own vision of street legal super sports cars on the foundation of Porsche bodys.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.sub-title: S01 : E35 Offroad Minis
programme.desc: Small 4x4's are on the rise, as it doesn't need to be size that matters when it comes to having fun in the city or off-road. We take a look at mini SUVs, the Fiat's 500 X, the Cross Polo and Cross up! by Volkswagen and BMW's X1 XDrive.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 Land Rover Special
programme.desc: The Land Rover Defender is one of the oldest offroad car models. We took a look at this iconic vehicle and 70 years of Land Rover history. Also: we took the Range Rover Evoque, the most recent model of the British brand, to the legendary Silk Road.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E47 Close to the ground
programme.desc: In their 4 series BMW took into account that sporty vehicles need a low center of gravity. In the manufacturer's range of vehicles this model is closest to the asphalt. We compared the BMW 435i and Porsche's Cayman S and took a look at the Alfa Romeo 4C.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E49 Athletes on stilts - Power SUVs
programme.desc: Since the rising popularity of SUVs compact models have become a new trend, so the manufacturers started offering more models and pushing their performance. We took a look at the competitors Audi RS Q3, Mercedes-AMG GLA 45 and Porsche Macan Turbo.

programme.title: Motorcycles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E32 Stereotypes on Two Wheels
programme.desc: Scooters, stereotypes on two wheels? It doesn't always have to be a classic Vespa! We take a look at three alternatives: Kymco's big scooter xciting 500 i that feels like riding on a sofa, Piaggio's three-wheeler MP3 500 with two front wheels that promises more dynamic driving pleasure and the powerful electric scooter e-max from China.

programme.title: Motorcycles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E38 Trikes
programme.desc: Whether taking it easy and cruising, or firing it up and drifting - trikes, scooters and three-wheeled bike conversions all have their own charm and driving dynamics, especially the trikes. We take a closer look at four rather exotic motorcycles: the Rewaco RF1 Turbo, Piaggio's MP3 and bike conversions for the Suzuki 800 Intruder and the Triumph Rocket III Touring.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Fiat Dino
programme.desc: The Fiat Dino Spider is one of the most beautiful cabriolets of the 1960s. Its impeccable design was created by Pininfarina, and only 525 units were built. Under its hood growls a Ferrari V6 engine.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E45 50 Years Corvette Stingray
programme.desc: 1963 saw the launch of the Chevrolet Corvette Stingray, the brand's answer to established sports car models by Jaguar, Maserati and others. Many consider it to be the most exciting sports car of all time. We pay tribute to this classic.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E34 The Advantages of All-wheel Drive
programme.desc: We took the all-wheel model of the Mazda CX-5 off the road in order to test its terrain capabilities. In addition: what does the third generation of BMW's so-called SAV X5 have to offer? And: Kia's compact SUV, the Sportage.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S03 : E60 Typically German
programme.desc: What are the characteristics of a typical German car? Do stereotypes like functionality, reliability but also a certain dullness paint a realistic picture? Also, we explored if the Volkswagen Golf GTE could bring new impulses to the brand's model range.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E118 Batman's Dreams: Supercars in Acceleration
programme.desc: The clash of the convertibles, the Nissan 370 Z in comparison to Porsche's Boxster S. Also: the exclusive one-off high-performance sports car Maybach Exelero. And: a dream of a sports car, a vehicle of superlatives, the Bugatti Veyron Vitesse.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E129 Jaguar F-Type
programme.desc: Jaguar found their way back to the world of sports cars. The F-Type is able to take on the competition like the BMW Z4. We also took a closer look at two other competitors, the Porsche Boxster S and Nissan's 370 Z.

programme.title: Top 10 Show
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 The Ten Most Fuel-efficient Cars
programme.desc: Not everyone can afford to pay vast sums of money for fuel. We present our top 10 most economical cars in terms of fuel consumption.

programme.title: Top 10 Show
programme.sub-title: S01 : E30 The Best Beastly Car Names
programme.desc: Car models are named after all sorts of things, from countries to ancient deities to animals. We take a look at the top 10 cars named after animals.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 The Ambulance
programme.desc: Stunt coordinator Domi’s latest idea for the Stunt Heroes team involves an old ambulance that is prepared so that the stuntman can jump right through the ambulance with his car.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 The Pile-Up
programme.desc: Fog, darkness and a pileup involving multiple cars, the Stunt Heroes want to recreate such a scene as part of a stunt with burning people, a fireman who arrives late at the scene and a car that flies through the air.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S03 : E173 Maserati Ghibli
programme.desc: With the Ghibli, Maserati advanced into a more affordable market segment. But the competition is strong. In addition: taking the Maserati GranCabrio MC on a cruise through the Alps.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E129 Jaguar F-Type
programme.desc: Jaguar found their way back to the world of sports cars. The F-Type is able to take on the competition like the BMW Z4. We also took a closer look at two other competitors, the Porsche Boxster S and Nissan's 370 Z.

programme.title: Top 10 Show
programme.sub-title: S01 : E38 The Most Beautiful Vintage Cars
programme.desc: There are classic cars that are undisputed beauties when it comes to design and look. We take a look at our top 10 most beautiful classic cars.

programme.title: Top 10 Show
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 The Most Successful Cars in the 24h Race
programme.desc: 24-hour races are one of the toughest tests for man and machine in motor racing. We present the most successful cars in this racing category in our Top 10 list.

programme.title: Top 10 Show
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 The Most Successful Cars in the 24h Race
programme.desc: 24-hour races are one of the toughest tests for man and machine in motor racing. We present the most successful cars in this racing category in our Top 10 list.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S01 : E94 Audi at Le Mans
programme.desc: At the 2012 Le Mans 24 Hours, Audi entered the R18 e-tron quattro for the first time. Also: the Porsche Cayenne GTS, the model between the S and the Turbo. And: the Mercedes-Benz CLS Shooting Brake.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E117 Million-Dollar Toys from the Middle East
programme.desc: The McLaren MP4 12C Spider, one of many high-performance sports cars featured at the Doha Motor Show in Qatar. Also: the creations of manufacturers like Lamborghini, Bertone or Porsche but also the first Arab super sports car, the Lykan HyperSport.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E104 Lamborghini
programme.desc: Sant'Agata Bolognese, the home of the iconic Italian sports car manufacturer Lamborghini, is the perfect place to take a look under the hood of the different Gallardo models. Also: cruising through Rome in an Aventador LP700-4.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E116 Open-Top Sportscars
programme.desc: The Audi R8 V10 Spyder's design and sophisticated technology was meant to set an example for what a car manufacturer is capable of. In addition: the Wiesmann Roadster MF5. And: Porsche's house tuner Ruf turned up the volume with their RT 35 model.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E104 Lamborghini
programme.desc: Sant'Agata Bolognese, the home of the iconic Italian sports car manufacturer Lamborghini, is the perfect place to take a look under the hood of the different Gallardo models. Also: cruising through Rome in an Aventador LP700-4.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E151 Power Packs With Space
programme.desc: Jaguar's supercharged V8 XF RS Sportbreak, the Porsche Panamera Turbo S and the Audi S8 combine space and comfort with the performance of a sports car. We compare these three contenders.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 Porsche Special
programme.desc: Porsche is a world-famous brand and a household name when it comes to sports cars. For over 70 years fans have been attracted to Porsche automobiles. But when was the big rise of the brand and when was their first car created?

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S03 : E66 Space Savers
programme.desc: The Volkswagen Samba transforms from pack mule into high-priced classic. And: a former letter box with 37 seats. The 1962 'Graf and Stift' post bus now takes tourists to their hotel.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Changing the model
programme.desc: BMW got into the electric mobility business with their ActiveE and i3 models. We visited the company's technology office in Silicon Valley. Also: the Stuck brothers at the test track with the Mercedes C 63 AMG. And: the Audi A3 Sportback.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E52 The big journey
programme.desc: The Mercedes-AMG E63 S is a wolf in sheep's clothing. This station wagon has more power than the Nissan GTR 'Godzilla'. Also: the Porsche Panamera GTS feels at home on the motorway and on the race track. And: Audi's powerful all-purpose executive car RS6.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Pikes Peak
programme.desc: The Pikes Peak Hill Climb is a rather unique type of car race in the mountains of Colorado, USA. It's exciting, tough and dangerous, and in 1987, two-time world rally champion Walter Roehrl took his Audi Sport Quattro S1 to the top.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Rally Sport 1983
programme.desc: In 1983 Audi introduced the Quattro 4x4 drive to the rally world, adding a new dimension to rally racing. The races became tougher and more brutal. The strain on drivers, vehicles and mechanics alike was extremely intense.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E38 Scrapyard Gold
programme.desc: It is not too unusual to find hidden gems of automotive history in a perfect condition in barns or scrap yards. Also: the MGC GT Sebring, that was built for the 12 Hours of Sebring race.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E47 British Sportscar Rarities
programme.desc: In the early 20th century people used to travel in vehicles like the Morgan Threewheeler, a mixture between motorcycle and car, thus avoiding the British tax on cars. We got hold of a 1936 Morgan Threewheeler and went for a ride.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Le Mans 1952
programme.desc: The year 1952 saw several premieres at the legendary 24-hour endurance race of Le Mans. After 22 years Mercedes-Benz returned to the famous circuit, and Ferrari started to use factory works team cars for the first time.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 German Touring Car Championship 1992
programme.desc: The Deutsche Tourenwagen Meisterschaft was one of the most important racing series in German motorsports. It was difficult, tough and well-known for its die-hard battles between the international competitors. We present the highlights of the 1992 race.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Ferry Porsche
programme.desc: After the Second World War, following in his father's footsteps who had been responsible for the development of the classic Volkswagen, Ferry Porsche laid the foundation for the brand's sports car models like the 356 and later the Porsche 911.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Walter Röhrl
programme.desc: One cannot talk about rally sports without mentioning the name Walter Röhrl. From an early age, Röhrl showed his talent in rally sports and won the European, World and other international rally championships several times in his career.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Audi Quattro - Triumph of an Idea, 1980
programme.desc: With the launch of the four-wheel drive 4WD in 1980, Audi changed the rally world. The company's advanced engineering not only improved the handling of the rally cars, but also confronted the drivers with new challenges.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Amphicar 770
programme.desc: The Amphicar 770 is a rare classic and a unique vehicle. It may not be the fastest car on the street, but it’s ready to be used on the water as well and drives like a motorboat.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 MG TC
programme.desc: The MG TC is a sporty, but also extremely spartan car with technology from the late 1940s. We accompanied the owner of a MG TC on his way to pass the TÜV, the German technical certification test.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S03 : E62 Auction Classics
programme.desc: Nowadays the gull-winged classic DeLorean is an automotive investment. Also: 100 dream cars under the hammer at a classic car auction in Switzerland. And: modern classics with investment potential like the Mercedes 190E 2.3 16V.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E41 Vintage Cars Worldwide
programme.desc: In Thailand a Mercedes 190 SL and other souped-up classics take part in the Bangkok Classic Car Ride. Plus: an Oldsmobile convertible on Venezuela's most beautiful island. And: classic cars from the US as a tourist attraction in Cuba.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Animal-like Cars
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, Dean Malay put the Hollywood appeal of the Volkswagen Beetle Convertible to the test. Also: at the BMW Design Night the Bavarian manufacturer showcased its newest creations. And: the Stuck brothers with the Lexus IS-F at the test track.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 To the Top!
programme.desc: The Audi Sport Quattro S1 was a rally legend. We checked how the company's series vehicle A1 Quattro fares in comparison. Also: the Stuck brothers take the Ford Focus ST to the test track. And: the spacey, but cute electric microcar Renault Twizy.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.sub-title: S01 : E33 Pickups
programme.desc: In Europe pickups are mainly used commercially. In the US these trucks are as common as SUVs. We compared the Volkswagen Amarok to the Toyota Hilux. Also: current US pickups, the Chevrolet Colorado and GMC's Sierra and Canyon.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 Tuned SUVs
programme.desc: SUVs usually are rather impressive right out of the factory, but there are many tuning and customizing options. In this episode we present Kelleners BMW X5, the Mercedes Brabus B63 and the Porsche Cayenne tuned by Techart.

programme.sub-title: S03 : E152 La Dolce Vita
programme.desc: With the Alfieri, Maserati in 2014 celebrated their anniversary with the introduction of a beautiful grand tourer. In remembrance and as part of the three-day celebration, Maserati organised a cruise from Bologna to Torino with some of their most iconic cars.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S01 : E94 Audi at Le Mans
programme.desc: At the 2012 Le Mans 24 Hours, Audi entered the R18 e-tron quattro for the first time. Also: the Porsche Cayenne GTS, the model between the S and the Turbo. And: the Mercedes-Benz CLS Shooting Brake.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E54 Sporty Fords
programme.desc: The 1955 Ford Thunderbird is part of Henry Ford's motorsports legacy. In addition: the Ford Capri from the May car tuning company is as fast as a 1970s Porsche. And: the Ford Mustang, the progenitor of the so-called pony car.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E104 Lamborghini
programme.desc: Sant'Agata Bolognese, the home of the iconic Italian sports car manufacturer Lamborghini, is the perfect place to take a look under the hood of the different Gallardo models. Also: cruising through Rome in an Aventador LP700-4.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E38 Scrapyard Gold
programme.desc: It is not too unusual to find hidden gems of automotive history in a perfect condition in barns or scrap yards. Also: the MGC GT Sebring, that was built for the 12 Hours of Sebring race.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S03 : E71 Mobility in Eastern Europe
programme.desc: In the 1950s, companies like Tatra from Czechoslovakia introduced advanced, even pioneering automobiles. The clientele was exclusive, which is why now these streamlined cars are big rarities. We tracked down the owner of a 1937 Tatra T87.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E51 Open Air Concert
programme.desc: As an homage to driving top-down we took a look at three of the most beautiful convertibles. The animalistic sound of the Audi S3 convertible's 4-cylinder is astonishing. But what about the Nissan 370 Z Roadster? Or Porsche's Boxster GTS?

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 Topless on the road
programme.desc: Convertibles suggest to the feeling of freedom while driving a car. We took a look at what Opel's Cascada and Adam convertible models had to offer. Also: what does the BMW 3 series Gran Turismo have in common with its bigger brother from the 5 series?

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E124 Special: 24h of Le Mans - Track Days
programme.desc: Two weeks before the start of the 24 hours of Le Mans, all teams are busy testing their cars on the traditional long distance track in France. Bad weather, accidents and a lot of tension, we documented the official test days in 2013.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S03 : E190 V8 Power
programme.desc: We took a look at Mercedes-Benz's first convertible model in their S-class. Also: for the Chevrolet Camaro's 50th anniversary in 2016 the brand released the sixth generation of their classic. And: a mountain cruise with the Corvette C7 convertible.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Episode 12
programme.desc: Once again it was time for the VLN Endurance Racing Championship. While the drivers were doing their test laps, we had a look behind the scenes and explored what went on in the pit lanes.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Episode 16
programme.desc: In this episode we invite you to witness the progress of driver Uwe Nittle as he got ready for qualifying at the Truck Grand Prix.

programme.title: Put Your Car On TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Chevy Camaro vs Mercedes SLS AMG
programme.desc: Mylene Gomera and Saif Hattawi invite car freaks from the Middle East to show off their souped-up vehicles on the "Walk" at Jumeirah Beach in Dubai. In this episode, a Chevrolet Camaro competes against a Mercedes SLS AMG.

programme.title: Put Your Car On TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 BMW X5 vs Mercedes SLK 230
programme.desc: If you like souped-up and luxuriously equipped vehicles, Jumeirah Beach in Dubai is the place to be. There, the cars are judged and there is also something to win. This episode features a BMW X5 and a Mercedes SLK 230.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S03 : E160 Road Stars
programme.desc: The Silvretta Hochalpenstrasse in Austria is the ideal playground for the lightweight power packs Lotus Elise and Roding Roadster. Also: the elegant but still very powerful Porsche 911 Targa 4S.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E106 Porsche to the Max
programme.desc: The Techart Grand GT by Porsche's house tuner is a souped-up Panamera. But the off-the-shelf GTS model also has its treats. Patrick Simon took this monster to the track. In addition: Ruf's anniversary model RT 35. And: the 911 Carrera 4.

programme.title: Put Your Car On TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 BMW X6M vs Nissan Patrol
programme.desc: At Jumeirah Beach in Dubai, car owners can have their souped-up vehicles judged in three categories and win an overnight stay at the Sofitel Hotel. This time, a BMW X6M, a Ford F250 and a Nissan Patrol are in the running.

programme.title: Put Your Car On TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Nova SS vs Honda Accord
programme.desc: On Put Your Car On TV, car fans from the Middle East can have their darlings rated in terms of speed, style and sound. Included this time: a Nova SS, a special Honda Accord and a car clad in crystals.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Episode 15
programme.desc: We present the highlights of last week. The 24 hour race was exciting, as usual. In addition, we explored the 'Strong Man Run' and took a look at the tourist drivers

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Episode 12
programme.desc: Once again it was time for the VLN Endurance Racing Championship. While the drivers were doing their test laps, we had a look behind the scenes and explored what went on in the pit lanes.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 Porsche Special
programme.desc: Porsche is a world-famous brand and a household name when it comes to sports cars. For over 70 years fans have been attracted to Porsche automobiles. But when was the big rise of the brand and when was their first car created?

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S03 : E66 Space Savers
programme.desc: The Volkswagen Samba transforms from pack mule into high-priced classic. And: a former letter box with 37 seats. The 1962 'Graf and Stift' post bus now takes tourists to their hotel.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Changing the model
programme.desc: BMW got into the electric mobility business with their ActiveE and i3 models. We visited the company's technology office in Silicon Valley. Also: the Stuck brothers at the test track with the Mercedes C 63 AMG. And: the Audi A3 Sportback.

programme.title: Monster Jam Replay
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 CFG Bank Arena - Baltimore, MD
programme.desc: Buckle up, Baltimore! The Arena Championship Series East is taking over the CFG Bank Arena for a night of pure, unadulterated horsepower. This isn't just a show; it's a high-stakes battle where 12,000-pound behemoths defy gravity and legendary rivalries—like father versus son and brother versus brother—push every driver to the absolute edge.

programme.title: Monster Jam Fast Track
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Snapdragon Stadium - San Diego, CA
programme.desc: High-speed brackets and split-second decisions define this Monster Jam Fast Track showdown as elite drivers push their trucks to the limit in racing and skills competition. Tyler Menninga’s Grave Digger sets the tone early, but relentless pressure from Zombie, El Toro Loco, Megalodon, and Vendetta turns every run into a must-win moment. Clean launches, aggressive cornering, and costly mistakes reshape the leaderboard as rivals trade momentum. With points on the line and no room for error, this episode delivers pure Monster Jam intensity from start to finish.

programme.sub-title: S2008 : E17 Edward Jones Dome - St. Louis, MO - Racing

programme.title: Primetime

programme.desc: Monster Jam Primetime continues with even more action in Indianapolis.

programme.title: World Finals
programme.sub-title: S2023 : E03 World Finals XXII - Nissan Stadium - Nashville, TN
programme.desc: Monster Jam World Finals XXII continues with the crowning of two new World Champions in the Lucas Oil High Jump competition and Target Freestyle. See the action as the Monster Jam season concludes with the biggest event of the year from Nissan Stadium in Nashville.

programme.title: Arena Series in 30
programme.sub-title: S2025 : E14 Resch Center - Green Bay, WI
programme.desc: Monster Jam revs into Resch Center for Round 14 of Arena in 30 - with freestyle and racing fun.

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2020 : E21 Angel Stadium - Anaheim, CA
programme.desc: On February 23, 2020, Angel Stadium is lit up once more with Monster Jam's 2020 season!

programme.title: World Finals
programme.sub-title: S2006 : E01 World Finals VII - Sam Boyd Stadium - Las Vegas, NV - Racing

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2004 : E15 Citrus Bowl - Orlando, FL - Racing

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2023 : E03 The Dome at America's Center - St. Louis, MO
programme.desc: Stadium Championship Series Red takes over the Dome at America’s Center. Can Grave Digger’s Adam Anderson hang on to the series points lead? Will Tom Meents celebrate 20 years of Maximum Destruction with a win close to home? Find out when Monster Jam heads to St. Louis, Missouri for Round 3.
